explains: v. 拖着脚走；（古）搪塞（shuffle 的现在分词）

sentences.en: There are various ways of shuffling and dealing the cards.
sentences.cn: 有各种不同的洗牌和发牌方法。

sentences.en: I hear him shuffling from the rug onto the linoleum behind me.
sentences.cn: 我听见他从地毯上拖着脚走到我身后的油毡上。

sentences.en: They heard the sound of slow shuffling footsteps approaching the door from the inside.
sentences.cn: 他们听到了从里面传来的缓慢的脚步声。
